required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Analysis of Clinical Efficacy Based on the Robotic, Laparoscopic, and Open Approach in Radical Resection of Rectal Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Analysis of Clinical Efficacy Based on the Robotic, Laparoscopic, and Open Approach in Radical Resection of Rectal Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: A retrospective study was done on the medical records for 24 rectal cancer patients underwent robotic proctectomy from September 2017 to July 2018 at the First Afﬁliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University.In the same department,a total of 25 patients who treated with laparoscopic proctectomy and 24 patients underwent open proctectomy were were selected as controls in a 1:1:1 ratio. Comparing the perioperative conditions and hospitalization related costs of the three groups.

intervention.description: Radical resection of rectal cancer in robotic, laparoscopic, and open approach

facility.name: First Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University
